item.title: The Great Lakes of Kashmir
item.author: gupta.karan.11@gmail.com (Karan Gupta)
item.description: The first thing that was planned post our break from work lives was a trek to Kashmir’s Great Lakes. A trek to 11 high altitude Alpine lakes via 3 treacherous passes covering a distance of 64 kms over 7 days. While I was skeptical about how I would fare at the trek, Karan was ever hopeful that I could do it. In a way both of us were looking forward to this trek as it marked the official beginning of our travel post the joblessness.
